text: (he nabee!) unase poochhiye ki jo kuchh aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai, vah kisaka hai? kahoh allaah ka hai! usane apane oopar daya ko anivaary kar[1] liya hai, vah tumhen avashy pralay ke din ekatr[2] karega, jisamen koee sandeh nahin. jinhonne apane-aapako kshati mein daal liya, vahee eemaan nahin la rahe hain
